author: mercya1
title: Expand Access to Extend Cardano
description: ++In areas with subpar electricity and internet penetration, how can grassroots populations help realize Cardano's potential & solutions++
importance: Without support, electricity and internet accessibility challenges will hamstring Cardano's overall potential and goal to bank the unbanked
success: Create well resourced Community Centres in local communities targeted at solving local problems on Cardano to expand Cardano's market
